Literature.Title: Cell-Penetrating Antimicrobial Peptides Derived from an Atypical Staphylococcal δ-Toxin
Literature.Author: Deeyagahage K, Ruzzini A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-44(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-41(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1683(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-2094(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-42(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-2313(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=56±1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus pseudintermedius(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Staphylococcus auricularis(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Staphylococcus equorum(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Streptococcus sciuri(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pasteurella multocida(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=50µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH10B(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Mannheimia haemolytica ATCC 33396(MIC=6.25µg/ml)
